Detailed Description

This file provides support for real time clocks on some boards.

Revision
73842

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum cvmx_rtc_options_t

Supported RTC options.

Enumerator:
CVMX_RTC_READ 

Device supports read access.

CVMX_RTC_WRITE 

Device supports write access.

CVMX_RTC_TIME_EPOCH 

Time stored as seconds from epoch.

CVMX_RTC_TIME_CAL 

Time stored as calendar.

Function Documentation

static uint32_t cvmx_rtc_read ( void   )  [inline, static]

Read time from RTC device.

Time is expressed in seconds from epoch (Jan 1 1970 at 00:00:00 UTC)

Returns:
Time in seconds or 0 if RTC is not supported
static cvmx_rtc_options_t cvmx_rtc_supported (  )  [inline, static]

Return options supported by the RTC device.

Returns:
Supported options, or 0 if RTC is not supported
static uint32_t cvmx_rtc_write ( uint32_t  time  )  [inline, static]

Write time to the RTC device.

Parameters:
time Number of seconds from epoch (Jan 1 1970 at 00:00:00 UTC)
Returns:
Zero on success or device-specific error on failure.
